name: Yellow Rose Candle
imageAlt: Yellow Rose Candle - Decorative Floral Candle
description: Handcrafted yellow rose-shaped candle, perfect as a decorative piece or gift. Blends floral fragrance with elegant design.
careInstructions: Trim wick to 0.5 inch. Burn for 3-4 hours per session.

name: White Lotus Candle
imageAlt: White Lotus Candle - Lotus Meditation Candle
description: Pure white lotus candle designed for meditation and relaxation. Calming lotus fragrance creates a serene atmosphere.
careInstructions: Keep away from drafts. Never leave burning unattended.

name: Pink Rose Candle
imageAlt: Pink Rose Candle - Rose Shaped Decorative Candle
description: Gorgeous pink rose candle that doubles as home décor. Combines beauty with premium rose fragrance.
careInstructions: Place on heat-resistant surface. Do not move while burning.

name: Yellow Cube Candle
imageAlt: Yellow Cube Candle - Cubic Shaped Candle
description: Modern cubic design in bright yellow. Long-lasting scent and contemporary aesthetic for any room.
careInstructions: Ideal for modern interiors. Allow to cool before moving.

name: Cactus Candle
imageAlt: Cactus Candle - Cactus Shaped Decorative Candle
description: Unique cactus-shaped candle that adds a playful touch to your décor. Refreshing green fragrance.
careInstructions: Keep away from heat sources. Not suitable for outdoor use.

name: Pink Cactus Candle
imageAlt: Pink Cactus Candle - Pink Cactus Shaped Candle
description: Charming pink cactus candle combines cute design with lovely floral fragrance. Perfect gift for plant lovers.
careInstructions: Keep away from children and pets. Trim wick regularly.

name: Cup Candle
imageAlt: Cup Candle - Tea Cup Shaped Candle
description: Whimsical teacup-shaped candle brings warmth and comfort. Cozy fragrance perfect for relaxation.
careInstructions: Use in well-ventilated areas. First burn should last 2-3 hours.

name: Mix Flowers in Cup
imageCaption: Colorful mixed flowers arranged in a cup candle
imageAlt: Mix Flowers in Cup - Floral Cup Candle
description: Gorgeous arrangement of mixed flower-shaped candles in a decorative cup. Multi-floral fragrance for festive occasions.
careInstructions: Store in cool, dry place. Avoid direct sunlight.

name: Cube Candle
description: Timeless cubic design in neutral tones. Premium fragrance and long burn time for discerning candle lovers.
careInstructions: Limited edition. Perfect for gifting. Handle with care.

name: Coffee Cup Candle
imageCaption: Coffee-scented candle in a decorative cup
imageAlt: Coffee Cup Candle - Coffee Scented Candle
description: Aromatic coffee candle perfect for coffee lovers. Creates a cozy café atmosphere at home.
careInstructions: Never leave unattended while burning. Keep away from flammable items.

name: Drizzle Cylinder Candle
imageCaption: Artistic cylinder candle with drizzle design
imageAlt: Drizzle Cylinder Candle - Artistic Cylinder Candle
description: Contemporary cylinder candle with artistic drizzle effects. Modern design meets traditional craftsmanship.
careInstructions: Ideal for modern home décor. Burn with mindfulness.

name: Pack of 2 Cubes
imageAlt: Pack of 2 Cubes - Twin Cubic Candles
description: Perfect gift set with 2 premium cubic candles. Create a pair of glowing ambiance in any room.
careInstructions: Perfect for gifting. Bundle pricing offers great value.

name: Mini Teddy Bear Candle
imageAlt: Mini Teddy Bear Candle - Cute Teddy Bear Shaped Candle
description: Adorable mini teddy bear candle perfect for kids or cute home décor. Small but mighty in charm and fragrance.
careInstructions: Trim wick to 0.25 inch. Perfect for small spaces.

name: Mini Cup Candle
imageAlt: Mini Cup Candle - Mini Cup Shaped Candle
description: Delightful mini cup candle that looks like a steaming beverage. Perfect tabletop décor with cozy fragrance.
careInstructions: Place on heat-resistant surface. Enjoy the aesthetic appeal.

name: Purple Flower
imageCaption: Elegant purple flower candle with intricate mould design
imageAlt: Purple Flower - Purple Flower Shaped Candle
description: Exquisite purple flower candle crafted with detailed mould design. Premium floral elegance for any space.
careInstructions: Trim wick to 0.5 inch. Display proudly as décor.
